participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing, thoughtful, and creative, Jordan enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others on a personal level.
participant_1.background: I love to listen to rap music on YouTube and read about my favorite charities on their websites. My family and friends are my favorite people. I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends. My beard is a part of my personality, and I love antiques. I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic, artistic, and caring, Emily has a passion for education and creativity, always looking to inspire and engage those around her.
participant_2.background: I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I draw comics. I like to dance with my friends.

content.text: hey there! what's good?
good! just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education!
congrats! what are you going to do now?
I'm going to be a teacher!
that's awesome! what grade level?
kindergarten!
cool! I think that's the perfect age to start!
yeah! I'm really excited to meet my students
I'm sure they'll be really lucky to have you!
thank you! I'm really excited to start my new career
what are your interests?
I love to draw comics, dance, and spend time with my family and friends
wow! that's a lot of interests!
yeah! I try to keep myself busy
that's good! what kind of comics do you draw?
all sorts of things! I like to draw superheroes, animals, and landscapes
awesome! I'd love to see some of your work sometime
sure! I'll send you some
great! thanks
no problem!
